docs.snippet: A trailer loaded with fireworks exploded Thursday near a Texas high school, killing one person and injuring three other people who were setting up for a Fourth of July show, authorities said....

docs.snippet: Northwestern University on Thursday urged the National Labor Relations Board to overturn a regional ruling that would allow its scholarship football players to unionize, holding up the football program as exemplifying the university's integration ...

docs.snippet: Former Vice President Dick Cheney seems reinvigorated as he takes on President Obama, the Clintons, radical Islam, Rand Paul, his own party and history. But to many, he is a punch line....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Vice President Dick Cheney seems reinvigorated as he takes on President Obama, the Clintons, radical Islam, Rand Paul, his own party and history. But to many, he is a punch line.
docs.abstract: Former Vice Pres Dick Cheney, seemingly reinvigorated physically and politically two years after a heart transplant, is on attack against Democrats, radical Islam and even some in his own party; frustrated by what he considers Pres Obama's weakness as extremist groups seize wide portions of Iraq, Cheney has blitzed airwaves and formed a new organization to promote American national security.

headline.main: Cheney’s Back, Blitzing Rivals and Drawing Scorn
headline.print_headline: Cheney’s Back, Blitzing Rivals, Drawing Scorn

docs.snippet: Iraqi insurgents are preparing for an assault on Baghdad, with sleeper cells planted inside the capital to rise up at "Zero Hour" and aid fighters pushing in from the outskirts, according to senior Iraqi and U.S. security officials....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iraqi insurgents are preparing for an assault on Baghdad, with sleeper cells planted inside the capital to rise up at "Zero Hour" and aid fighters pushing in from the outskirts, according to senior Iraqi and U.S. security officials.

headline.main: Iraq Chases Baghdad Sleeper Cells as 'Zero Hour' Looms Over Capital
headline.print_headline: Iraq Chases Baghdad Sleeper Cells as 'Zero Hour' Looms Over Capital
